MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA21 postcode area of Saltcoats. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.45pm to repair an underground cable fault on Kinnier Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:07PM on Friday 15 January 2021.
